dog.description: Loyal motivator who fetches wins and guards your streaks.

fox.description: Quick-witted planner who helps you outsmart triggers.
fox.name: Foxy Focus

koala.description: Sniffs out trouble and keeps your breath fresher than a Paris morning.
koala.name: Monsieur Sniff

zebra.description: Balanced guide reminding you: one step at a time, one stripe at a time.
zebra.name: Zen Zebra

preview.message: The memory lives on, but tobacco is in the past.

welcome.subtitle: Your friendly guide to quitting smoking — one small step at a time.
welcome.title: Welcome to QuitQly!

shop.description: A wonderful companion for your journey to quit smoking.
shop.sceneDescription: A beautiful background to enhance your quit smoking journey.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: Exclusive achievements are under construction
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to bring you amazing exclusive achievements. Stay tuned for updates!

achievements.locked: Locked. Update your plan to unlock this achievement.

zebra-m.name: ZebraBro
zebra-m.description: Run with me, and we'll leave smoke behind faster than it can catch us.

dog-m.name: SpudDog
dog-m.description: Stick with me — we'll beat smoke faster than it thinks.

fox-m.name: GingerBoss
fox-m.description: With two clever heads, smoke stands no chance — we'll quit twice as fast.

alpaca-m.name: Lamburger
alpaca-m.description: Climb with me — and we'll reach the smoke-free top faster than we think.

koala-m.name: Don Snooze
koala-m.description: Embrace life with me — and we'll shake off smoke faster than it can cling.

dog-w.name: SpudQueen
dog-w.description: Together we shine brighter, and quitting smoke gets easier and faster.

alpaca-w.name: Lamazing
alpaca-w.description: Side by side we'll breathe fresh air and chase smoke away in no time.

fox-w.name: FoxyBossy
fox-w.description: Let's outsmart smoke together — the two of us will finish this game fast.

koala-w.name: NapCutie
koala-w.description: Together we'll find peace — and leave smoke far behind much faster.

zebra-w.name: Zebrabelle
zebra-w.description: If we dream side by side, smoke will disappear twice as fast.

first-spark.name: First spark
first-spark.description: First 24 hours without smoke or vape — your start.

hold-on.name: Hold On
hold-on.description: Three days smoke-free — proving your willpower.

steel-week.name: Steel week
steel-week.description: One week without nicotine — your strength grows.

bright-moon.name: Bright moon
bright-moon.description: Two weeks smoke-free — feel the change.

fresh-path.name: Fresh path
fresh-path.description: A full month smoke-free — new habits forming.

freedom.name: Freedom
freedom.description: Three months without nicotine — enjoy your freedom.

hero.name: Hero
hero.description: Half a year smoke-free — you are unstoppable.

legend.name: Legend
legend.description: Almost a year without smoking — become a true legend.
